title: John Deere 's total assets 2013 to 2019
yAxis: Total assets in million U.S. dollars
summary: The John Deere Total assets U.S. of Deere was to 73011.0 million in 2019 .
This was up from 70108.0 million the Year earlier , the highest U.S. in the past six years .
What is the Total assets U.S. ? Total assets is essentially the amount of money a bank has on hand in case it needs to cover unexpected expenses from risky transactions .
gold: This statistic represents John Deere 's ( Deere & Company 's ) total assets from 2013 through 2019 . In 2014 , the Fortune Global 500 company held total assets to the value of approximately 61.3 billion U.S. dollars .
